SpeciesRule

species
class esmraldi.speciesrule.SpeciesRule(name, category, mz, count=1, count_per_mol=1, begin=None, end_mz=None, family_number=None, naming_fn=None, adduct_fn=None)¶

Class to model the rule of a species Used to generate several species repeated a given number of times

species(self)¶

Extracts all species from this rule Creates a dictionary: key=name, value=m/z ratio

Returns:
dict

dictionary mapping species to m/z ratio
